int trf::ExportAll ( QString  fileName,
double  wPhoton,
TPhotonMap *  photonMap 
)

Saves to filename file the photonMap all information.

The file first data is the wPhoton. The power per photon in W/m2.

int trf::ExportSurfaceGlobalCoordinates ( QString  fileName,
InstanceNode *  selectedSurface,
double  wPhoton,
TPhotonMap *  photonMap 
)

Saves to filename file the selectedSurface photons in scene global coordinates.

The file first data is the wPhoton. The power per photon in W/m2.

InstanceNode *  selectedSurface,
double  wPhoton,
TPhotonMap *  photonMap 
)

Saves to filename file the selectedSurface photons in scene surface node local coordinates.

The file first data is the wPhoton. The power per photon in W/m2.

void trf::TraceRay ( Ray &  ray,
QMap< InstanceNode *, QPair< BBox, Transform * > > *  sceneMap,
InstanceNode *  instanceNode,
InstanceNode *  lightNode,
TPhotonMap &  photonMap,
RandomDeviate &  rand 
)

Traces the given ray with the scene with top instance instanceNode and saved the intersections information in the photonMap.

The sceneMap saves the scene elements BBox and Transform in global coordinates.
